overview: The sexiest spy alive, Agent Drake, races against time to bring down the evil Von Romar. Using her sexual prowess and a slew of super-sexy spy gadgets, including condoms that make men tell the truth after blowing their load, and the Morphinator, which transforms Drake into a cheerleader, janitor, bride and other fantasy-driven characters, Agent Drake turns Covert Operations into Pervert Operations.
title: Sexpionage: The Drake Chronicles
